text: Groups of female BALB / c mice ( n = 2 to 5 ) were immunized twice within a 21 - day interval with 10 8 plaque - forming - units ( PFU ) of recombinant MVA - MERS - N or non - recombinant MVA ( MVA ) or PBS as mock vaccine . Vaccinations were given via the intramuscular ( i . m . ) or intraperitoneal ( i . p . ) route using 25 µL ( i . m . ) or 200 µL ( i . p . ) volumes per inoculation . All mice were monitored daily for welfare and potential adverse events of immunization . At day 8 post prime - boost immunization , animals were sacrificed by cervical dislocation and spleens were taken for T cell analysis .
